item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: February 4, 2026 Today's Verse Proverbs 25:28 [28] A man without self-control is like a city broken into and left without walls. Today's Memory Verse 2 Corinthians 5:17 - Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come. Today's Westminster Catechism Q/A 35 - What is sanctification? Sanctification is the work of God's free grace, whereby we are renewed in the whole man after the image of God, and are enabled more and more to die unto sin, and live unto righteousness.
